enWisdom: Kindness is a treasure and the munificent is one who obtains it

Wisdom: اصْطِنَاعُ الْأَكَارِمِ أَفْضَلُ ذُخْرٍ وَأَكْرَمُ اصْطِنَاعٍ
enWisdom: Doing good to the honourable ones is the best provision and the noblest deed

Wisdom: الِاصْطِنَاعُ ذُخْرٌ فَارْتَدْ عِنْدَ مَنْ تَضَعُهُ
enWisdom: Righteous work is a provision, so be wary of whom you are placing it with

Wisdom: الْإِفْضَالُ أَفْضَلُ قِنْيَةٍ وَالسَّخَاءُ أَحْسَنُ حِلْيَةٍ
enWisdom: Doing a good turn is the best acquisition [for the Hereafter], and generosity is the best ornament
The best of provisions is having righteous work
The best of provisions is having righteous work

Wisdom: زِدْ فِي اصْطِنَاعِ الْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَكْثِرْ مِنْ إِسْدَاءِ الْإِحْسَانِ فَإِنَّهُ أَبْقَى ذُخْراً وَأَجْمَلُ ذِكْراً
enWisdom: Increase your benevolent acts and bestow more favours, for this is a more lasting provision and a more beautiful legacy

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِصَنَائِعِ الْمَعْرُوفِ فَإِنَّهَا نِعْمَ الزَّادُ إِلَى الْمَعَادِ
enWisdom: Perform benevolent works, for they are the best provisions for the Hereafter
How good a store [for the future] benevolence is!

Wisdom: نِعْمَ زَادُ الْمَعَادِ الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْعِبَادِ
enWisdom: The best provision for the Hereafter is doing good to the people
